member.name: T:Stormpath.AspNet.Mvc.StormpathCustomDataRequiredAttribute
member.summary: Requires a matching Stormpath Custom Data element to be present for the user.

member.name: M:Stormpath.AspNet.Mvc.StormpathCustomDataRequiredAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Stormpath.AspNet.Mvc.StormpathCustomDataRequiredAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.Object,System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer{System.Object})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The comparer to use when comparing Custom Data values.

member.name: T:Stormpath.AspNet.Mvc.StormpathGroupsRequiredAttribute
member.summary: Requires the user to be in a Stormpath Group.
member.remarks: The functionality of this attribute matches AuthorizeAttribute. Multiple Groups in a single attribute are treated as an OR. Use multiple StormpathGroupsRequiredAttribute to create AND conditions.

member.name: M:Stormpath.AspNet.Mvc.StormpathGroupsRequiredAttribute.#ctor(System.String[])
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The case-sensitive name or href of a Stormpath Group.
